name: Behold (Mehow)
description:
A long time ago in a shitty ass neighbourhood a young Mehow was probably twelve and bored out of his mind. Mehow decided that he wanted to make a game so he went ahead and did that and then created this thing.

It's a bullethell where you get to choose the bullets.

nuf said
